statements: SELECT * FROM BrandTrends WHERE brand_id = 1;
SELECT brand_name, trend_category FROM BrandTrends WHERE trend_category = 'Fashion';
SELECT brand_name, consumer_preference FROM BrandTrends WHERE brand_id < 5;
SELECT * FROM BrandTrends WHERE trend_description LIKE '%new%';
SELECT trend_category, brand_name, consumer_preference FROM BrandTrends ORDER BY consumer_preference DESC;
SELECT * FROM BrandTrends WHERE brand_id = 1;
SELECT brand_name, trend_description FROM BrandTrends WHERE trend_category = 'Fashion' ORDER BY brand_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT brand_id) AS num_brands, trend_category FROM BrandTrends GROUP BY trend_category ORDER BY num_brands DESC;
SELECT brand_name, trend_description FROM BrandTrends WHERE consumer_preference LIKE '%positive%' AND trend_category IN ('Technology', 'Healthcare');
SELECT brand_id, brand_name, trend_category FROM BrandTrends WHERE trend_description LIKE '%innovative%' OR trend_description LIKE '%trending%' ORDER BY brand_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM fashion_brands;
SELECT brand_name, consumer_segment FROM fashion_brands;
SELECT brand_name, consumer_segment FROM fashion_brands WHERE brand_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM consumer_preferences;
SELECT consumer_id, preferred_brand FROM consumer_preferences WHERE sustainable_materials = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM fashion_brands;
SELECT brand_name, consumer_segment FROM fashion_brands ORDER BY brand_name DESC;
SELECT brand_name, consumer_segment FROM fashion_brands WHERE consumer_segment = 'Women' ORDER BY brand_name ASC;

SELECT brand_name, COUNT(preferred_brand) AS preferred_count FROM fashion_brands
JOIN consumer_preferences ON fashion_brands.brand_id = consumer_preferences.consumer_id
GROUP BY brand_name
HAVING preferred_count > 2;
SELECT brand_name, consumer_segment FROM fashion_brands WHERE brand_name LIKE 'A%' OR brand_name LIKE 'B%' ORDER BY brand_name;
SELECT * FROM brand;
SELECT brand_name, established_year FROM brand WHERE established_year > 2000;
SELECT brand_name, location FROM brand ORDER BY brand_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM consumer WHERE age BETWEEN 18 AND 30;
SELECT consumer_name, gender FROM consumer WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT brand_name, established_year FROM brand ORDER BY brand_name ASC;
SELECT trend_name, start_date, end_date FROM fashion_trend WHERE brand_id = '1a2b3c4d-5e6f-7g8h-9i0j-1k2l3m4n';
SELECT consumer_name, age, gender, location FROM consumer WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT brand_name, COUNT(*) AS trend_count FROM brand JOIN fashion_trend ON brand.brand_id = fashion_trend.brand_id GROUP BY brand_name ORDER BY trend_count DESC;

SELECT brand.brand_name, COUNT(*) AS consumer_count FROM brand JOIN fashion_trend ON brand.brand_id = fashion_trend.brand_id JOIN consumer ON fashion_trend.consumer_id = consumer.consumer_id WHERE consumer.age > 25 GROUP BY brand.brand_name ORDER BY consumer_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Brand;
SELECT brand_name, brand_country FROM Brand WHERE brand_country='USA';
SELECT product_name, price FROM Product ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT consumer_name, age, gender FROM Consumer WHERE age > 30;
SELECT brand_name, product_name, purchase_date FROM Brand JOIN Product ON Brand.brand_id = Product.brand_id JOIN Purchase ON Product.product_id = Purchase.product_id;
SELECT * FROM Consumer WHERE age > 30;
SELECT Product.product_name, Product.price, Brand.brand_name FROM Product JOIN Brand ON Product.brand_id = Brand.brand_id;

SELECT Consumer.consumer_name, Product.product_name, Purchase.purchase_date FROM Consumer JOIN Purchase ON Consumer.consumer_id = Purchase.consumer_id JOIN Product ON Purchase.product_id = Product.product_id;
SELECT Brand.brand_name, COUNT(Product.product_id) AS total_products FROM Brand LEFT JOIN Product ON Brand.brand_id = Product.brand_id GROUP BY Brand.brand_name;

SELECT Consumer.consumer_name, Product.product_name, Purchase.purchase_date, Purchase.quantity FROM Consumer, Purchase, Product WHERE Consumer.consumer_id = Purchase.consumer_id AND Purchase.product_id = Product.product_id;
SELECT brand_name, headquarters_location FROM Brand;
SELECT * FROM Product WHERE price > 100;
SELECT consumer_name, gender FROM Consumer WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM Purchase ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Product WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM Brand WHERE brand_name = 'Nike';
SELECT consumer_name, email FROM Consumer WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Product WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT p.product_name, c.consumer_name FROM Product p JOIN Purchase pu ON p.product_id = pu.product_id JOIN Consumer c ON pu.consumer_id = c.consumer_id WHERE c.gender = 'Female';
SELECT brand_name, founding_date, COUNT(*) AS product_count FROM Brand JOIN Product ON Brand.brand_id = Product.brand_id GROUP BY brand_name, founding_date ORDER BY product_count DESC;
